title: ICYMI - Kate Fagan on Uncovering Madison Holleran's Private Struggle in "What Made Maddy Run"
itunes:title: ICYMI - Kate Fagan on Uncovering Madison Holleran's Private Struggle in "What Made Maddy Run"
description:
"What Made Maddy Run" author Kate Fagan discusses the suicide of UPenn athlete Madison Holleran and the impact that social media and college sports can have on mental health.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
